overview: Paris By Night 97 - Khiêu Vũ Của Các Ngôi Sao 2 is a Paris By Night program produced by Thúy Nga that was filmed at the Knott's Berry Farm on April 22, 2009 and released onto DVD September 22nd, 2009. The show was approximately 5 hours and was MC'ed by Nguyễn Văn Thinh and Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên.
title: Paris by Night 97: Celebrity Dancing 2
